sqlMap.select: select status_invoice_id as statusInvoiceId, name as name, to_id as toId from master_status_invoice
select status_invoice_id as statusInvoiceId, name as name, to_id as toId from master_status_invoice where status_invoice_id = #statusInvoiceId#
select b.status_invoice_id from master_status_invoice a,master_status_invoice b where a.status_invoice_id = #statusInvoiceId# and b.status_invoice_id = a.to_id
sqlMap.update: update transaction_invoice_header set status_invoice_id = #nextStatusId# where transaction_invoice_id = #invoiceNumber#
